items.title:
Your new toolchain uses GitHub Issues for issue tracking. 

To keep your Track & Plan data, you must transfer it to GitHub Issues now. [Learn more](https://console.ng.bluemix.net/docs/services/ContinuousDelivery/upgrade_projects.html)
By default, all of your work items are migrated. If you want to migrate only specific items, specify a [Track & Plan query]({{rtcSharedQueriesLink}}).
items.description: Work Items will be selected based on this Query (from Shared Queries). If Query is not specified, all work items are selected.
Track & Plan data will not be migrated.
